arguments.argument: draw_text(MainApple.x, MainApple.y+32, "alarm[1]:" + string(alarm[1])+" alarm[1] ms:" + string(alarm[1]/room_speed*1000)+" Intro pos:" +string(saud_Position(intromid))+" Intro len:" +string(saud_Length(intromid))+" Intro speed:" +string(saud_BytesPerSec(intromid))+" Intro status:" +string(saud_Status(intromid))+" Loop pos:" +string(saud_Position(loopmid))+" Loop len:" +string(saud_Length(loopmid))+" Loop speed:" +string(saud_BytesPerSec(loopmid))+" Loop status:" +string(saud_Status(loopmid))+" End len: "+string(saud_Length("ClockTowerEnd"))+" Other End len: "+string(saud_Length("OtherEnd"))+" introisover: "+string(introisover)+" " )
